timeline.bodyText:
Should we also remove any existing handlers here as well, just in case? (Since we do initialize handlers in the constructor here: 
  
    
      rstudio/src/gwt/src/org/rstudio/studio/client/workbench/views/source/editors/text/ace/AceBackgroundHighlighter.java
    
    
        Lines 168 to 170
      in
      e2be2ee
    
    
    
    

        
          
           handlers_ = new HandlerRegistrations( 
        

        
          
                 editor.addEditorModeChangedHandler(this), 
        

        
          
                 editor.addAttachHandler(this)); 
        
    
  

)
Or, maybe we can just remove that initialization and only init in attach / detach as you currently have things?
timeline.author: kevinushey

replies.bodyText: We can't remove the constructor's initialization because otherwise this function won't be set as the editors' attach handler and doesn't get called. I updated the code to remove handlers regardless of attaching or detaching.
